short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds some extra functionality to the WPEngine Dashboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a "Save Defaults" button to the WP Engine Backup popup to save description and email address(es), to re-populate those fields when initiating a backup, and it adds Copy to Clipboard buttons to the Hostname, Port, and Username fields in the SFTP Page, in the WP Engine Dashboard.
